page.title: 11THE METHODIST SUNDAY SCHOOL
page.content: CHILDREN START METHODIST SUNDAY SCHOOL AT THE AGE OF 3 WHEN THEY CAN SIT STILL AND LISTEN.THERE ARE THREE CLASSES;4/5;6/7/8;9 AND OVER.AT PRESENT 27 CHILDREN ATTEND;ABOUT 30% OF THE VILLAGE CHILDREN.THE PRESENT TEACHER MRS M.THOMPSON,TOOK OVER FROM M1SS W.THREADGOLD 21 YEARS AGO.THE OLDER CHILDREN HELP THE LITTLE ONES.THEN SOME BECOME TEACHERS THEMSELVES.SUNDAY SCHOOL IS PART OF THE WESLEYAN CHAPEL.ABOUT 15 PEOPLE ATTEND EVENING SERVICES AT CHAPEL EXCEPT ON SPECIAL OCCASIONS WHEN THE WHOLE CONGREGATION JOIN TOGETHER.THESE ARE;THE ANNIVERSARY HARVEST AND CHRISTMAS CELEBRATIONS.AN ANNUAL GARDEN PARTY IN THE SUMMER RAISES MONEY,AS WELL AS PROVIDING INTEREST AND EXCITEMENT.A SUNDAY SCHOOL QUEEN IS ELECTED AND CROWNED.THERE ARE 4 FUNERALS A YEAR;BUT FEW CHRISTENINGS.
